channel.title: Shops :S
channel.description:
im using allstar v1 as my source ok and i wanna add a shop .. this is what i do in autospawn [code]
spawn = 534 3284 2772 0 0 0 0 0 1 fairy shop [/code]
in shops [code]
shop = 69 Fairy Shop 2 2 1052 100 [/code]
client [code]
} else if (NPCID == 534) { // Fairy Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 69; // Fairy Shop [/code]
i save compile and run without any errors and then i go trade and nothing comes up can anyone help?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 16, 2008, 02:17:36 PM[/size][hr]someone must know

item.title: Shops :S
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

Dude i know how you feel all my codes looked like that and everything was working one day all my shops stopped working and its something to do with case 155://first click npc and i can’t figure it out and no one helped me either?

Read full topic

PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 69; // Fairy Shop [/code]
